overview:
challngr is a mobile social network that connects people with their favorite brands.

challngr allows any brand or product to receive suggestions, ideas and wishes from users and create promotions and experiences based on their preferences.

challngr is a direct marketing platform that offers solutions to any business or professional interested in interaction with their online audiences through their smartphones using promotions and experiences.

challngr provides an automated, self-manageable tool for businesses and professionals interested in creating medium and long term experiences and promotions.

Users can find stores, websites, brands and products, show their preferences, interact with them and participate in promotions and experiences.

challngr uses AR, QR codes, Social Media sharing, and other smartphone features to provide experiences to any user.

Promotions on demand social network, where Users create their brands map and Brands create their users network.
